channel.title: ASR on Almost Unsupervised Text to Speech and Automatic Speech Recognition
channel.description: Recent content in ASR on Almost Unsupervised Text to Speech and Automatic Speech Recognition

item.title: Audio Sample from "Almost Unsupervised Text to Speech and Automatic Speech Recognition"
item.description: Authors Yi Ren*1, Xu Tan*2, Tao Qin2, Sheng Zhao3, Zhou Zhao1, Tie-Yan Liu2 * Equal contribution. 1 Zhejiang University, 2 Microsoft Research, 3 Microsoft STC Asia Abstract Text to speech (TTS) and automatic speech recognition (ASR) are two dual tasks in speech processing and both achieve impressive performance thanks to the recent advance in deep learning and large amount of aligned speech and text data. However, the lack of aligned data poses a major practical problem for TTS and ASR on low-resource languages.
